Native.name: AnimTriggerRead
Native.note: Read Config of AnimTrigger, Params: Path like: 'LOCAL:Animtrigger'

Native.name: CompilerCleanup
Native.note: Cleanup files after compiling, Params: File passed to CompileQVM

Native.name: ConfigCompile
Native.note: Compile any config file, Params: Config: 'WEAPONS:weaponconfig.qsc' p1 ??, p3 ??

Native.name: ConfigRead
Native.note: Read game config file, Params:  File: 'LOCAL:config.qsc'

Native.name: ConfigWrite
Native.note: Write game config file, Params: File: 'LOCAL:config.qsc'

Native.name: CutsceneDelete
Native.note: Delete current cutscene, Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: ErrorShow
Native.note: Show error message from game, Params: Error message.

Native.name: FramesSet
Native.note: Set game frames, Params: 30,60 max 240FPS.

Native.name: GameMaterialLoad
Native.note: Load game material.qvm to memory.

Native.name: GraphicsReset
Native.note: Reset Graphics options in settings, Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: GraphOpen
Native.note: Open graph of level,Params: with str 'Graph4019.dat'

Native.name: HumanplayerLoad
Native.note: Load Humanplayer.qvm file to memory.

Native.name: InputDisable
Native.note: Disable input of player., Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: InputEnable
Native.note: Enable input of player., Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: LogAdd
Native.note: Add internal game log message., Params: message to log.

Native.name: LevelLoad
Native.note: Load current level from level_path,Params: path: 0057B568, len: 0x1E.

Native.name: LevelQuit
Native.note: Quit current level to mainmenu.

Native.name: LevelRestart
Native.note: Restarts current level.

Native.name: LevelStart
Native.note: Start new level, Params:  p1: 0057BABC

Native.name: MenuManager
Native.signature: int* MenuManager(int p1,char *menu_str,char p3,char p4,int p5);
Native.note: MenuManager load for inagame or Mainmenu,Params:  p1: 0057BABC ,p3,p4,p5: 0.

Native.name: MusicDisable
Native.note: Disable Game Music, Params:  Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: MusicEnable
Native.note: Enable Game Music, Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: MusicSetSfxVolume
Native.note: Sets sound effect volume, Params: volume range [0.0 - 1.0]

Native.name: MusicSetVolume
Native.note: Sets music volume., Params: volume range [0.0 - 1.0]

Native.name: MusicUpdateVolume
Native.note: Update current music volume, Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: PhysicsObjTypeRead
Native.note: Read Physics obj config file, Params: config file.

Native.name: QhashInit
Native.note: Init hash table value, Params: hash value 0 or 1.

Native.name: QhashReset
Native.note: Reset QTask type hash table.

Native.name: QscCompile
Native.note: Compile QSC file to QVM, Params: QSC script file like 'LOCAL:objects.qsc'

Native.name: QtaskUpdate
Native.note: Update QTask hash table call before loading level.

Native.name: QtaskUpdateList
Native.note: Update all QTask list, Params: p1 ??

Native.name: QvmAssemble
Native.note: Assemble QAS assembler file, Params: Assemler source file like 'objects.qas'

Native.name: QvmCompile
Native.note: Compile qvm file loaded in memory, Params: address of QVM file loaded from 'LoadResource' method.

Native.name: QvmLoad
Native.note: Compiles and Load any .qvm file into memory, Params: any qvm file name,  Returns filename loaded.

Native.name: QvmParse
Native.note: Parse Assembler source file, Params: any QAS file name and Memory allocated by Mem_Alloc(),  Returns status.

Native.name: ResourceFlush
Native.note: Releases the current holding resources, Params: Params: p1 ??

Native.name: ResourceLoad
Native.note: Load resource in Memory and Returns address of file., Params: resource file like 'sounds.res','AI/303.qvm'

Native.name: ResourceUnload
Native.note: Unload resource loaded in memory, Params: resource file like 'sounds.qvm','AI/303.qvm'

Native.name: IsResourceLoaded
Native.note: Check where resource is in loaded in memory, Params: resource 'sounds.qvm','AI/303.qvm' and address of res file

Native.name: ResourcePackUnpack
Native.note: Packs and return address or Unpacks resource file into memory depending upon resource type, Params: resource 'sounds.res','terrain.res', and buffer.

Native.name: ResourceUnpack
Native.signature: void ResourceUnpack(int* res_ptr, int res_addr, int res_size);
Native.note: Unpacks resource file into memory, Params: Resource ptr, address where to unpack (Allocate using Mem_Alloc) and size of resource.

Native.name: ScriptInit
Native.signature: void ScriptInit(char* file_name,int p2,int p3,int p4);
Native.note: Init script buffer for Assembler, Params: Use QvmLoad(file_name) first.

Native.name: ScriptSetsymbolCxt
Native.note: Set symbol context before loading it, Params: symbol_name like 'TaskType_Set'.

Native.name: StatusMessageClear
Native.note: Clear current status message from screen not from memory, Params: Buffer of size 30.

Native.name: StatusMessageShow
Native.note: Show status message on screen, Params: msg to show, sprite of msg, status_timer 0xA758AC, status_byte &0x567C74.

Native.name: SymbolRemove
Native.note: Remove symbol from memory, Params: symbol_name like 'TaskType_Set', p1 pointer ??

Native.name: TasktypeSet
Native.note: Defines new constants for game and scripts ,Params: task_str (int**)WEAPONTYPE_PISTOL, task_id

Native.name: WarningShow
Native.note: Show warning message, Params: message to show.

Native.name: WeaponConfigRead
Native.note: Read weapon config file into memory, Params: p1 is 0, cfg_file is 'weaponconfig.qvm'

Native.name: SymbolCheck
Native.note: Check symbol in QTask list if already loaded, Params: symbol_name like 'TaskType_Set', p1,p3 ??

Native.name: GameDefineOptions
Native.note: Define game options constants , Params: opt_str (int**)'DefineAmmoType'

Native.name: ScriptBufInit
Native.note: Init buffer for scripts, Params: buffers with last param as size.

Native.name: SoundLoad
Native.note: Load all level sounds from path , Params: Path of sound like 'MISSION:sounds'

Native.name: MemoryAlloc
Native.note: Allocate memory for game, Params: Check calloc() in c.

Native.name: MemoryDealloc
Native.note: Deallocate allocated memory.

Native.name: MissionOpen
Native.note: Open current mission file , Params: Pointer to mission file.

Native.name: FileOpen
Native.note: Open file for reading or writing, Params: Check fopen() in c.

Native.name: QFileOpen
Native.note: Open Qfile (QSC,QVM) for reading or writing, Params: Check fopen() in c.

Native.name: RigidDyncubeObjRead
Native.note: Read rigid dynCube config file , Params: config file of rigid dynCube.

Native.name: MagicObjLoad
Native.note: Loads magic objects from path, Params: Path 'LOCAL:magicobj'

Native.name: AnimTriggerLoad
Native.note: Loads anim trigger objects from path, Params: Path 'LOCAL:animtrigger'

Native.name: PhysicsObjLoad
Native.note: Loads physics objects from path, Params: Path 'LOCAL:physicsobj'

Native.name: AmmoTypeOpen
Native.note: Open ammo qvm file to memory for all weapons loaded.

Native.name: WeaponTypeOpen
Native.note: Open all weapons defined in .qsc file for Humanplayer.

Native.name: GameDataSymbolLoad
Native.note: Load game data symbol to buffer for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc. Params: like (buf,'LOCAL:models/%s.mef','000_02_1')

Native.name: GameDataSymbolRemove
Native.note: Removes game data symbol for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc.

Native.name: SymbolRegisterBool8
Native.note: Register new symbol of type 'Boolean' for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc.

Native.name: SymbolRegisterInt16
Native.note: Register new symbol of type 'Int16' for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc.

Native.name: SymbolRegisterInt32
Native.note: Register new symbol of type 'Int32' for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc.

Native.name: SymbolRegisterReal32
Native.note: Register new symbol of type 'Real32 aka Float' for game like internal vairables,UI controls,timers etc.

Native.name: LoadingScreenShow
Native.note: Show menu loading screen before loading level.

Native.name: QTaskHashTableSet
Native.signature: void QTaskHashTableSet(int **symbol,int ptr_func,int symbol_val,int p4,int p5,int p6,int p7)
Native.note: Main Hash Table for QTasks types for Objects(Guns,Ammo,Scripts,Variables etc) in whole game. HashTable is 70bytes long for each QTask.

Native.name: WeaponsCountGet
Native.note: Get total number of Weapons in game.

Native.name: WeaponGunPickup
Native.note: Weapon pickup from ground, Param: param_ptr is in defined in Constants as 'gun_pickup_ptr', set Weapon Id in type_ptr like *(0x19F720) = 5

Native.name: WeaponAmmoPickup
Native.note: Ammo pickup from ground, Param: param_ptr is in defined in Constants as 'gun_pickup_ptr', set Ammo Id in type_ptr like *(0x19F820) = 3

Native.name: PlayerXPHit
Native.note: Get Player XP Hit damage for current health.

Native.name: HumanViewCam
Native.note: Camera view for Human Player/Soldier , Param: soldier_ptr is pointer to Entity you are changing and cam_type is [1-6]

Native.name: HumanTaskViewReset
Native.note: Reset Human view angle after changing it by Zoom (Dragunov,Binoculars).

Native.name: IsPlayerProfileActive
Native.note: Checks if current player profle is active.

Native.name: SoldierExecute
Native.note: Execute current soldier in level, Param: ptr = (addr+0x2EC) and soldier address.
